refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns fully qualified DNS name of the host associated with given IP address

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This calls the system function gethostbyaddr() and returns h_name from the hostent structure returned by it. If no hostent structure returned, then it returns it's argument.

refsect2.title: address
refsect2.para: A string containing an IP address

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: Returns fully qualified DNS name of the host associated with 'address'. If no such address the return will contain same value as 'address' parameter.
